name: Crawl Space
description:
Crawl Space is a puzzle game where you control a 6 legged spider

Come check out the Discord Server while you're at it!: https://discord.gg/NHxAEHp

The First Release of Crawl Space features 21 Fully Playable Levels with the ability to best your own score! Challenge your friends! (No Online Leaderboards, Sorry!)

There's also a level editor.
